tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE routing_information (
  vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_name VARCHAR(50),
  route_id INT,
  current_location VARCHAR(100),
  destination VARCHAR(100),
  estimated_time_of_arrival TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE fleet_vehicles (
  vehicle_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  vehicle_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  current_location VARCHAR(100),
  driver_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE routing_information (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_id INT NOT NULL,
  origin_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  destination_location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  distance_miles FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE vehicle_routes (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vehicle_id INT,
    route_details TEXT,
    distance_covered FLOAT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_vehicle_id FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id) REFERENCES routing_information(vehicle_id)
);

CREATE TABLE optimization_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    route_id INT,
    optimization_details TEXT,
    execution_time TIMESTAMP,
    CONSTRAINT fk_route_id FOREIGN KEY (route_id) REFERENCES vehicle_routes(route_id)
);

CREATE TABLE vehicles (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  vehicle_name VARCHAR(50),
  vehicle_type VARCHAR(50),
  license_plate VARCHAR(15),
  driver_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE routes (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  start_location VARCHAR(100),
  end_location VARCHAR(100),
  distance_in_km FLOAT,
  vehicle_id INT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_vehicle_id
    FOREIGN KEY (vehicle_id)
    REFERENCES vehicles(id)
);

CREATE TABLE schedules (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  driver_id INT,
  route_id INT,
  start_time TIMESTAMP,
  end_time TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT fk_driver_id
    FOREIGN KEY (driver_id)
    REFERENCES drivers(driver_id),
  CONSTRAINT fk_route_id
    FOREIGN KEY (route_id)
    REFERENCES routes(route_id)
);
